name: 莊慶昌
objective:
掌握形式從屬機能旨意，熟悉施作技術限制與創意可行性，學習從設計到實作的落實，透過各種機械設備操作、加工技術學習，實際接觸及操作真實材料，了解材料種類、性質、加工過程、組裝知識、技術與美學等，以呈現設計作品之原型與成品。
Based on “Form follows Function”, student will learn interacts and limitations among technology feasibility and creative application, in order to master sequential implementations form design ideas to real works. Students are required to operate various mechanical equipment and processing technologies, thus to realize the types and nature of the materials, processing procedure, as well as the assembly of knowledge, technologies and aesthetics to format intended design prototypes and establishments.
